channel.title: Visual Arts on David Broska
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Arts on David Broska

item.title: Path Dependencies in Careers of Visual Artists
item.description: 1 Introduction 2 Concept 3 Data 4 Path dependencies 5 Conclusion 1 Introduction This article analyzes how social hierarchies between visual artists arise and persist. Specifically, I draw on an empirical strategy proposed by Fraiberger et al. (2018) to distinguish successful and less successful careers. The authors analyze artist careers as sequences of exhibition participations in museums and galleries of higher or lower prestige.
